merger_description:
GE Healthcare Technologies Inc (**GE Healthcare**), through a wholly owned subsidiary, proposes to acquire Intelerad Topco Holdings ULC and Intelerad Holdings ULC (together, **Intelerad**) (the **Acquisition**).

GE Healthcare is a global medical technology, pharmaceutical diagnostics, and digital solutions company.

GE Healthcare has a portfolio of enterprise imaging products for healthcare providers. This includes products that manage patient data, images and enterprise content, picture archiving and communication systems (**PACS**) and radiological information systems, which manage the storage and reporting of radiology images. GE also manufactures medical imaging equipment, including CT, ultrasound, MRI and X-ray.

Intelerad is a global medical imaging software provider that specialises in diagnostic viewing (including PACS), reporting, archiving, and collaboration tools for healthcare providers.

anzsic_codes.name: Computer System Design and Related Services
